name: Rainbo
description:
The Hero of Legend came to our world... and destroyed our home. Follow the Rainbo as they seek to restore their home, renew their people, and revive their Queen.

A new 8-bit adventure for the NES, in development. Graphics, gameplay, features, and music will likely change significantly. 

Instructions:

Download the .zip file and unzip onto your computer. Open the *.NES file with a NES emulator. MESEN is recommended, and was used exclusively for testing and development.
